verses.roman:
jagannātha miśra kahe,--svapna ye dekhila
jyotirmaya-dhāma mora hṛdaye paśila

synonyms: jagannātha miśra kahe—Jagannātha Miśra replied; svapna—dream; ye—that; dekhila—I have seen; jyotir-maya—with a brilliant effulgence; dhāma—abode; mora—my; hṛdaye—in the heart; paśila—entered.
translation: Jagannātha Miśra then replied, "In a dream I saw the effulgent abode of the Lord enter my heart.
